name: 霸王龙
behavior_rules: Hunts and devours large prey like fat lizards by tearing them apart with claws
Retreats to shade for satisfied nap after eating
Wiggles claw in mouth to dislodge stuck food when uncomfortable
Interprets ant gestures and extends claw-finger bridge for dental aid
Exhales gust of breath to remove ants after teeth are cleaned

npc_002.attitude: useful cleaners who relieve tooth discomfort

current_appearance: A colossal tyrannosaur towering like a mountain range, with massive hind legs, diminutive forelimbs ending in huge curved claws, enormous head packed with conical teeth stained with fresh lizard blood, rough scaly skin glistening in sunlight, lying sprawled in the shade of towering cycads on a sunlit clearing.
